about_the_game:
Use the free 🛠️Gardener Plant Creator🛠️ app to design plant species that can be grown in game 🍀Gardener: Master of Trees and Flowers🍀. All your 🛠️Gardener Plant Creator🛠️ app unlocks and plants will be available in 🍀

New plant parts can be found in random fruits, and are also rewarded daily for playing, making screenshots and sharing plant species on Steam Workshop.

Key Features:

🌿 Advanced Plant Customization: Mix and match procedurally generated branches, leaves, fruits, and flowers to create your botanical designs. Select structure, size, shapes and shades, to recreate any possible species. Fine-tune branching factors, layers, stages, fractality and more to sculpt your creations exactly as you envision them.

🧬 Real DNA Included: The plants are not 3D models, they are living organisms. Each node encapsulates the plant's entire genetic code, with the chance to mutate at every stage of growth, resulting in a unique specimen, seeds and cuttings.

With 🛠️Gardener Plant Creator🛠️, creating the ultimate GMO species has never been easier.

💾 Easy to Share: Share your plant designs with friends and the community. Generate Plant Nucleotide Genome files at the touch of a button for easy uploading and downloading. Simply drag and drop the png files containing plants into the game to import new species.

🔓 Unlockable Gene Gems: Every day until the release of 🍀Gardener: Master of Trees and Flowers🍀, 🛠️Gardner Plant Creator🛠️ will give you free gems containing plant genes, ready to be shattered and added to your gene collection. Simply log in to the game and get a head start on other Gardeners without having to unlock the genes through the in-game progression/store. Gems can be also randomly found in squashed fruits, and are rewarded once a day for making screenshot/sharing plant design in Steam Workshop.

💰 Min-max Plants: Create the most expensive plants and the most cost-effective designs that produce the most sweetest, biggest fruit. Create cheap annual flowers or eye-poppingly expensive orchard trees to balance maintenance and seedling costs.

📸 Time-Lapse Generation: Want to share more than just screenshots and plant designs? Use the in-game GIF generator to create time-lapse animations that show your plants in all their spinning glory.

📈 Detailed Growth Simulation: From seedling to mature tree, watch your plants grow over time. With a powerful time-lapse system, each plant can be simulated at any stage of growth, allowing you to see the first flowers open and the last leaf fall.

Select structure, size, shapes and shades, to recreate any possible species. Fine-tune branching factors, layers, stages, fractality and more to sculpt your creations exactly as you envision them.

🧬 Real DNA Included: The plants are not 3D models, they are living organisms. Each node encapsulates the plant's entire genetic code, with the chance to mutate at every stage of growth, resulting in a unique specimen, seeds and cuttings.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux/SteamOS
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 / Core i5 7th Gen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 580 / GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card:
  • VR Support:
  • Additional Notes:
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux/SteamOS
  • Processor: Ryzen 7 / Core i7 10th Gen
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 5700XT / NVIDIA RTX 2070
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card:
  • VR Support:

name: Gardener Plant Creator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 / Core i5 7th Gen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 580 / GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card:
  • VR Support:
  • Additional Notes:
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Ryzen 7 / Core i7 10th Gen
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 5700XT / NVIDIA RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card:
  • VR Support:
  • Additional Notes:

short_description: Use the free 🛠️Gardener Plant Creator🛠️ editor app to design your own unique, procedurally-generated plants, and prepare seeds of your favorite species for the botanical adventure awaiting in upcoming game 🍀Gardener: Master of Trees and Flowers🍀
